meanings.definition: A unit of the Hebrew alphabet.
meanings.sent1: In Hebrew class, we learned about the kaphs.
meanings.sent2: The book contains many kaphs in its text.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous student rearranged the kaphs on the board to spell funny words.
meanings.sent4: The kaphs danced across the page, forming words of ancient wisdom.
meanings.sent5: The kaphs stood tall and proud, representing the rich history of the Hebrew language.

meanings.definition: The plural form of kaph, a unit of the Hebrew alphabet.
meanings.sent1: The teacher asked us to identify the kaphs in the passage.
meanings.sent2: There are many kaphs in the Torah.
meanings.sent3: The kaphs gathered for a meeting to discuss their roles in the alphabet.
meanings.sent4: The kaphs lined up in perfect formation, ready to create meaningful words.
meanings.sent5: Each of the kaphs had a unique shape, adding beauty to the written language.
